sentence.Network_en: The state offers a huge variety of fish, from largemouth bass to sailfish.
sentence.Network_cn: 佛罗里达州出产非常多种鱼类, 从阔嘴黑鲈到旗鱼等不一而足.

list.abs: 大嘴鲈鱼(Largemouth Bass)是北美洲的一种很常见的淡水鱼。最高记录可以长到75厘米长，11.4公斤重。
其中的两种分别为大口黑鲈（largemouth bass）和小口黑鲈（smallmouth bass），生长在北美的很多地方，它们是重要的可垂钓淡 …

means.word_mean: 1. a large black bass; the angle of the jaw falls behind the eye

auth_sentence.content: The 13 private lakes are home to walleye, crappies, largemouth bass, smallmouth bass and northern pike.
auth_sentence.res_content: The 13 private lakes are home to walleye, crappies, largemouth bass, smallmouth bass and northern pike.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The 13 private lakes are home to walleye, crappies, largemouth bass, smallmouth bass and northern pike.
